attributes.additional_details:
Southampton City Council Has Cut Millbrook's Youth Centre Funding And Has Move Us Into A Smaller Building.

The Building Is Smaller Than A Classroom And You Can Not See The Outside From The Room.
Also The New Building Is In A Public Place Which Can Cause Future Problems Such As People Walking In, People Wrecking The Room And Other Reasons.

Please Sign The Petition So We Can Move Back Into Are Bigger Building.

Thank You
